title: You saw it here first
content:
Imagine my surprise to find that Yahoo! had discovered the blog I introduced here. Pardon the hubris, but here's the link --   
   
 [http://picks.yahoo.com/picks/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063710/http:/picks.yahoo.com/picks/)
author: giam

comments.content:
Congratulations! That was a nice surprise, I'm sure.   
   
Great nostalgia.   
   
ML
